data.title: Roman Catholic Church in the State of Hawaii
data.meta_description: The Office of Faith Formation provides leadership and support for Catholic parish and school catechetical leaders within the Diocese of Honolulu on our shared mission to evangelize and catechize.
data.text:
CATECHIST FORMATION:

DIOCESAN LAY ECCLESSIAL MINISTRY FORMATION AND CERTIFICATION

Forming catechists in faith for their evangelizing mission is an essential duty for us as leaders. We are pleased to introduce the Franciscan University Catechetical Institute, our new resource for catechist formation and certification. And --- access to this resource will be free of charge to you and your catechists!

OVER 1000 LEARNERS HAVE BEGUN THEIR CATECHIST FORMATION ON "FRANCISCAN AT HOME"!

Need to get your catechists on board? Start with the OVERVIEW and INTRODUCTORY VIDEOS.

Contact Lisa if you'd like to get started!
